Ask a Librarian!

Library Hours

*Hours may differ on holidays and when classes are out of session. Up-to-date hours can be found here: https://library.llu.edu/all-library-hours. 

Monday:        7:00am - 11:00pm

Tuesday:       7:00am - 11:00pm

Wednesday:  7:00am - 11:00pm

Thursday:      7:00am - 11:00pm

Friday:           7:00am - 4:00pm

Saturday:       Closed

Sunday:         10:00am - 11:00pm

Welcome to the Information for Students Guide. This guide is designed to help you use the resources the library has available to you, and make sure you can find help when you need it.

In this guide you will find information on:

  • Finding Resources
  • Research Help
  • School-Specific Resources
  • Library Services
  • Other Helpful Guides

Ask a Librarian!

Have questions about library resources? If you need help, please reach out to us!

Make an appointment with a Librarian:

  • Book an appointment here

Send the Research & Instruction Librarians an email:

  • llulibref@llu.edu

Call the Reference Librarian on shift:

  • Call 909-558-4550 and ask for the reference librarian
  • You can find the hours a reference librarian is available here: https://library.llu.edu/all-library-hours

Report a problem with a journal:

  • Email libjournals@llu.edu
